properties.name: aliyun.oss.bucketName
properties.description: 阿里云OSS bucketName, 即三级域名.

properties.name: aliyun.oss.endpoint
properties.description: 阿里云OSS Endpoint, 如 oss.aliyuncs.com.

properties.name: aliyun.oss.bucketReferer
properties.description: 阿里云OSS bucket 防盗链,多个请使用英文逗号做分隔. 如: https://www.aliyun.com/,https://www.example.com/ .
